body_html: @briangoodness : That does seem weird, though I'm not sure it's a good idea to copy the files over the installation. An alternative would be to copy the files to their own directory and rewrite the imports a bit, so that example code isn't picked up from the installation.

body: @briangoodness : That does seem weird, though I'm not sure it's a good idea to copy the files over the installation. An alternative would be to copy the files to their own directory and rewrite the imports a bit, so that example code isn't picked up from the installation.
